Name: Vagrant Hearts
About the game: Description The sisters Scarllet and Beatrice have lived their entire life in their small village. One day, Beatrice discovered she had the gift to heal anyone with a simple touch and she became the village’s healer. Her ability eventually caught the interest of the mysterious Brotherhood.
